service.an_ssl_certificate_lets_: An SSL certificate lets your website visitors know that they are securely viewing the site of a trusted business. Once the certificate is installed a green padlock will be visible next to your domain name. Since Google began including SSL certification in its ranking algorithms, it is even more important for businesses to adopt this protocol in order to rank well in the search engines.
